_header: Jesu Christ heaven king / Give us all good ending
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — four 6-line stanzas (aabccb), with three extra lines prefacing stanza 1

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Iesu crist heouene kyngȝef vs alle god
                    endyng…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…þat we mowe come toþe ioie wiþ oute
                    fyne
